players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I was in the kitchen all night, you all saw me. I saw Charlie in the living room, not me. I think Diana is the one."
Charlie: "Bob, you are the mafia. I've investigated you and found you to be mafia."
Diana: "Bob, you are the mafia."
You: "I think Charlie is mafia. He was in living room. Vote him out."
Charlie: "Bob knows I'm detective but still targets me. He's the one with motive to deflect. Diana's accusation is weak. Vote Bob."
Diana: remained silent.
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I was in the kitchen all night, you all saw me. I saw Charlie in the living room, not me. I think Diana is the one."
You: "Bob, you are the mafia. I've investigated you and found you to be mafia."
Diana: "Bob, you are the mafia."
Bob: "I think Charlie is mafia. He was in living room. Vote him out."
You: "Bob knows I'm detective but still targets me. He's the one with motive to deflect. Diana's accusation is weak. Vote Bob."
Diana: remained silent.
